title: Setting up OpenClaw
summary: A step-by-step guide to installing and configuring your personal AI agent.
content:
Setting up OpenClaw

OpenClaw is your personal AI operating system. Follow these steps to get started:

1. Installation

npm install -g openclaw

2. Configuration

Run the init command to set up your workspace:

openclaw init

3. Connecting Models

OpenClaw supports Gemini, Claude, and local models. Edit your config.json to add your API keys.

title: Integrating Gemini API
summary: Learn how to use Google's Gemini Pro in your own applications.
content:
Integrating Gemini API

Google's Gemini API offers powerful multimodal capabilities.

Get your Key

Visit AI Studio to generate an API key.
